item.title: 【UPSCALED】The Chipettes - Single Ladies (Put A Ring On It) [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM 16-bit 44.1 kHz]
item.description:
Genre: Funk / Soul, Pop
Style: Contemporary R&B
Year: 2008 (The Chipettes cover: 2009)
Video Source: Blu-ray, 1080p
Audio Source: Qobuz

"Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)" is a song recorded by American singer Beyoncé, from her third studio album, I Am... Sasha Fierce (2008). The song was written by Beyoncé, Terius "The-Dream" Nash, Thaddis "Kuk" Harrell, and Christopher "Tricky" Stewart, and produced by Nash and Stewart. It explores men's unwillingness to propose or commit. In the song, the female protagonist is in a club to celebrate her single status.

"Single Ladies" won three Grammy Awards in 2009, including Song of the Year, among other accolades. Several news media sources named it as one of the best songs of 2008, while some considered it one of the best songs of the decade. Rolling Stone ranked it at number 228 on their list of the 500 greatest songs of all time in 2021. It topped the US Billboard Hot 100 chart for four non-consecutive weeks and has been certified 9x platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song charted among the top ten within the singles category in several other countries. Globally, it was 2009's seventh best-selling digital single with 6.1 million copies sold.

The song appeared in Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel a year after the song was released as it was sung by the Chipettes. An extended version is also included in the Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack (2009). The music video of the Chipettes cover was released on RHINO's YouTube channel on on August 4, 2010. It has accumulated almost 706 million views as of June 2024 and it is the most viewed music video on RHINO's channel.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track (Qobuz, CD quality) is synced and edited with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced + edited. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
